thread.title: Ed Sheeran, Ruby Rose to co-host MTV Europe Music Awards
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran, Ruby Rose to co-host MTV Europe Music Awards - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ed Sheeran, Ruby Rose to co-host MTV Europe Music Awards
text:
British singer Ed Sheeran and 'Orange Is the New Black' actress Ruby Rose are set to host the 2015 MTV Europe Music Awards later this month.
READ: 'Don't' hitmaker Ed Sheeran doesn't understand fuss over lion tattoo
The stars announced the news via their respective social media account that they will host the awards show which this year will take place in Milan on October 25, reported Ace Showbiz.
"So happy to say I'm hosting the #MTVEMAs on 25th October! Cannot wait," Sheeran told his fans in an Instagram post.
Shortly after, Rose posted the forthcoming event's poster featuring her posing next to the British singer.
She wrote in the caption, "So excited to be hosting the MTV EMAS In Milan with Mr @edsheeran !!! See you there!!"
This year's MTV EMAs is scheduled to air live on Sunday, October 25 from the Mediolanum Forum in Milan, Italy.
For
Sheeran's friend Taylor Swift leads the nominees with record-breaking nine nods including three for her collaboration with Kendrick Lamar, 'Bad Blood' .
She's additionally up for Best Female, Best Pop and Best Live Act among others.
Listen to Ed Sheeran on Gaana.com
Other acts with multiple nominations are Sheeran himself, Justin Bieber, Nicki Minaj, 5 Seconds of Summer, One Direction and more.
